alert.note: Alert for Golden Valley; Judith Gap; Melville Foothills; Musselshell; Northern Stillwater; Northern Sweet Grass; Southern Wheatland (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 10 at 1:18PM MST until February 10 at 9:00PM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds gusting up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of central and south central Montana. * WHEN...Until 9 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Strong crosswinds will make travel difficult. Warm and dry conditions combined with the strong winds could cause rapid fire spread. Use caution with any burning activities.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution and consider postponing travel until winds subside, or take an alternate route. Secure loose items to prevent damage from flying objects.

area.areaDesc: Golden Valley; Judith Gap; Melville Foothills; Musselshell; Northern Stillwater; Northern Sweet Grass; Southern Wheatland
